traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The septon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
entries: The septon has advantage on initiative checks.

traits.name: Disintegration
entries: If the septon dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The septon makes four Tentacle attacks and uses Lightning Network or Spellcasting.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the septon can't use this tentacle against other targets. The septon has seven tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Lightning Network
entries: The septon conjures a field of electricity that fills a 30-foot cube originating from itself before dissipating. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10 damage) lightning damage and has the {@condition stunned} condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A {@condition stunned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
